channel.title: Co Owner Crown
channel.description:
Hey im not sure if this is the right place to post this.. sorry if it is but i need a co owner crown.. like this one [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/4458/owner5.jpg[/img]
but instead of having the "O" it in have it be like "Co" or something.
ty

item.title: Co Owner Crown
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

I don’t see how this belongs in any other section. Editing an image does not pertain to RuneScape private server clients at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Co Owner Crown
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“Orngequirrel, post:6, topic:361319”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=457599.msg3349453#msg3349453 date=1285127833]

Wrong section, and don’t be stupid…

Wow, so you go from whiny to ass hole? Jesus, the least you can do is help the kid.

@ OP: This should have been posted in the sub-forum for this section. Also, its not hard to change the crown, just open the image in Paint and make it say “Co” with some simple pixel editing.
[/quote]Don’t.

Just fucking dont, youll just start another flame war[/quote]

No, because I have learnt how to control my anger, I won’t let it get to that point, and I would like it dylan if you please don’t dwell in the past, it doesn’t matter anymore

Read full topic
